job_history.work_description: Traveled throughout service area to educate community, met with people interested in receiving services and represented agency before wide range of professional constituencies. Counseled prospective applicants on admissions process and opportunities by explaining documentation and timeframes. Promoted integration of services for clients, including behavioral health care and long term services to enhance continuity of care.

Developed and implemented policies and procedures for Licensed Home care Agency. Audited Patient Charts. Hired Employees. Met with Physicians and State workers on a Quarterly basis For QA meetings. Organized activities to reward employees and motivate performance improvements.

skills.name: Public Speaking
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience educating the community, representing the agency before professional constituencies, and counseling prospective applicants, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Community Outreach
skills.explanation: Traveled throughout the service area to educate the community and promote integration of services, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Policy Development
skills.explanation: Developed and implemented policies and procedures for a Licensed Home care Agency, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Hired employees, met with physicians and state workers, and organized activities to reward employees, showing a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Quality Assurance
skills.explanation: Participated in quarterly QA meetings with physicians and state workers, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Employee Management
skills.explanation: Hired employees and organized activities to reward employees, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Effectively communicated with prospective applicants, physicians, state workers, and employees, indicating strong proficiency.
